title: Did U.S. Rep. Cheney Accuse Native Tribes of “Destroying Our Western Way of Life”?
subtitle: A coalition of Native American tribes, groups, and individuals fought for the Yellowstone grizzly’s relisting under the Endangered Species Act.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: U.S. Rep. Liz Cheney accused tribes of “destroying our Western way of life” over court-mandated protections for the Yellowstone grizzly bear.
